name: reinspection
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of looking at something or someone carefully for a second time, especially to check that everything is correct and legal: The officials discovered the problem after a routine re-inspection. The repaired building is due for reinspection this week. Related words
inspection
reinspect
More examplesFewer examplesThe restaurant was closed down and not allowed to reopen until it passed a reinspection.The meat had been inspected in Canada but was subject to re-inspection by the American authorities.Getting the repairs done and then arranging a re-inspection is a tiresome process.
